A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: So many times this film gets you on the edge of your seat then finds a way to disappoint. Awful handling of much loved characters and an introduction to characters that will be fogotton before the credits roll. The  thunderously stupid Plot made me snigger but not out of amusement but to hopefully disguise my sobs of frustration. Some excellent space battles intertwined with plot holes you could fly a star destroyer through. Certain scenes in the casino seemed to be taken from the cutting room floor\n of the phantom menace. I'll still be excited for ep9\, course I will but my expectations have been slashed dramatically. For me\, walking out the cinema\, I had a similar feeling as when I came out of kingdom of the Crystal skull. Yes\, that bad. Help me jj Abrams\, you're my only hope!
